snippet.title: Pokemon PC Master
snippet.description:
This is an ad for a Pokemon subscription service that was used to teach Japanese children how to use personal computers in the early 2000s. As it was subscription based, the whole game was lost when it lost support. But there is a trial version out there if you can somehow get it working on modern computers.

I noticed that the only other video of this was of poor quality and no sound so I thought I would upload a better version for those who were interested in lost Pokemon media.
